query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_schedules (
  schedule_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  content_type ENUM('ai_insights', 'custom_report') NOT NULL,
  report_template_id INT,
  frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly', 'monthly') NOT NULL,
  day_of_week INT,
  day_of_month INT,
  time VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
  recipients JSON NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  last_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_send TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_next_send (next_send),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_schedules (
  schedule_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  content_type ENUM('ai_insights', 'custom_report') NOT NULL,
  report_template_id INT,
  frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly', 'monthly') NOT NULL,
  day_of_week INT,
  day_of_month INT,
  time VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
  recipients JSON NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  last_sent TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_send TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_next_send (next_send),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active)
)
